brand.name: Wallcraft
brand.tagline: AI designed art for your home

hero.title: Your personal art studio
hero.subtitle: Design unique artwork tailored to your room. See it on your wall before you buy.

step1.title: Upload your room
step1.description: Take a photo of your wall and upload it. Mark the area where you want your artwork.

step2.title: Choose your style
step2.description: Pick from curated styles — minimal, Scandinavian, abstract, modern, photography and more.

step3.title: See it on your wall
step3.description: Get 4 unique concepts placed directly on your wall. Adjust size, frame and position.

upload.title: Upload your room
upload.description: Take a photo of your room or use our demo room to get started.
upload.dropzone: Drop your photo here or click to browse
upload.formats: JPG, PNG or HEIC — max 10 MB

wallMarker.title: Mark the wall
wallMarker.description: Click on the image to mark the 4 corners of the wall area

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Get inspired by designs from our community

boris.subtitle: Art & interior expert
boris.errorResponse: Sorry, I couldn't respond right now. Try again.
boris.networkError: Network error — couldn't reach Boris. Try again.
boris.actionStyle: Ask me which art style suits your room.
boris.actionEditor: Ask me about size, frame and placement.
boris.actionPrint: Ask me about prints, quality and framing.
boris.actionVariant: Ask me which variant fits best.
boris.actionChat: Ask me about art, interiors and design.

artChat.title: BorisArt AI
artChat.subtitle: Your art expert
artChat.greeting: Hi! I'm BorisArt AI, your personal art expert. I can help you analyze artworks, tell stories, discuss trends and give investment advice. I can also see which works you've scanned and saved in your portfolio. What would you like to explore today?
artChat.errorResponse: Sorry, I couldn't process your request right now. Try again later.
artChat.selectArtworkFirst: Please select an artwork first so I can tell its story.
artChat.needArtworks: You need some artworks in your portfolio or from scanning for me to analyze. Try scanning some artworks first!

market.uploadRoomDesc: Upload a photo of your room
market.takePhotoDesc: Take a photo of the wall where you want to hang
market.networkError: Network error. Check your connection and try again.
market.markWallDesc: Click to mark the 4 corners of the wall

artist.loginDesc: Log in to manage your artworks
artist.uploadFirstArtwork: Upload your first artwork to start selling!
artist.title: Title

posterLab.title: Poster Lab
posterLab.chooseFavoriteDesc: Choose the variant you like best, or refine with the controls

legal.studioNotice: AI-generated designs are created within the ArtBoris studio and are sold as physical prints for personal use. ArtBoris may display these designs in its gallery.
legal.studioConsent: By generating a design you agree to our terms.
legal.galleryNotice: AI-generated works created in the studio may be displayed in the ArtBoris Gallery.
legal.checkoutNotice: AI-generated designs are sold as physical prints for personal use according to our terms.
legal.termsCheckbox: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
